resources.string: Thanks to all contributors for translation
Startup the game will consume coins
Congratulations on unlocking all the paid advanced features of the %s.

Please remember your login account. After logging in with your ID, you can unlock all paid premium privilege features for any version of the %s emulator , including the upgraded version of this emulator in the future. There will never be no any extra charges for upgrading the new version.
An account can support up to 2 device logins. If you want to sign in to your account on your new phone, please after sign out of your account on your old device, sign in to your ID on the new device.
Purchase the professional version to unlock all features permanently, and to permanently removed ads displaying, and to lifetime free upgrade.
Save state slots has been increased from 2 to 4. Do you want to continue to increase it from 4 to 10?
Upgrade to the professional version to unlock all advanced features and NO ADs forever.
Now you only need to pay
Purchase this feature, or purchase the professional version to unlock all features.
"Deleting content is a paid feature. It can delete the game's recent history, ROM file, and save states."
Enabling GamePad is a paid feature. Please pay to unlock this feature.
Purchase the professional version to unlock all features permanently, and to permanently removed ads displaying, and to lifetime free upgrade.
Increase save state slots from 4 to 10.
Increase save state slots from 2 to 4.
Please do not close this window to avoid occurre unrecoverable data error.(For example, the game progress files lost, the APP crash frequently, etc.)
Upgrading data is finished. You can close this window safely now.
It may be a emulator booting crash

"If this graphics crash always happen, it may be caused by your device's out-of-date GPU graphics driver, which will crash on running OpenGL ES 3.1.
Please go to \"Settings — Graphics\", turn on the \"Disable OpenGL ES 3.1\", then retry again."
Are you sure to delete these contents?
Please select at least one item
This item must be selected and cannot be cancelled
"The \"EE Speed Tweak\" value is different between emulator setting and save-state. "

"
Solutions: 1. You can ignore this warning, the game may running unstable and has some wrong result. 2. Or you are lucky, the game is running well. If you do not want to see this warnning again, please save a new state after loading, or re-config the EE Speed Tweak value to the same with the value from save-state "
Because consuming coin failed. Please check your network connection.
Unable to switching between portrait mode and landscape mode.
Are you sure to remove these items from the game folder?
Enable Host MMU Emulation(exclusive memory instruction)
Enable Host MMU Emulation(genral memory instruction)
Loading the game state will consume coins
The memory card file format has been upgraded.
Otherwise, loading and saving game-progress will stop working.
"These %s memory card files are generated by other users. If you want to load other users' %s memory card files, please buy the Pro version!"
These %s memory card files may have %s game-progress. If you want to load these %s game progress, please buy the Pro version!
"Otherwise, these %s memory card files' data may be overwritten during the game."
Please upgrade your %s to the latest version.
Now, on Google Play Store, the rating of %s has already dropped below 4.0. But, we still need more time to optimize this emulator. Please support us and give us an encouraging rating.
Ignore. Please do not remind me again.
This APP is too bad. Give the bad rating!
Encourage developers. Rewarding for the 5-star rating!
The emulator no longer provide global settings for this option, please set it through the \"Game parameter setting\", or \"Debug Mode\".

We have set the optimal configuration for this game, these configurations cannot be modified dynamically during the game. If you think the current configuration is not optimal, please send us feedback.
The current setting is different from the official recommended configuration. In order to get a faster game frame rate, it is recommended to use the official recommended configuration.
Dynamic switching between portrait mode and landscape mode will consume coins
Would you like to save your changes?
The data in the %s memory card has been modified by the game. New data may include progress of the game.
The save state file format has been upgraded.
Otherwise, loading game-progress will stop working.
The file directory has exception, we suggest to delete the directory %s, then try again
This feature is already set to max value.
Dear users, thank you for your continued support! To better protect your rights and comply with relevant regulatory requirements, we have updated
If your phone already has a BIOS file, you can click %s, or find and tick it on the BIOS page. If the phone does not have a BIOS, you need to download a matching BIOS file.
You need to put the BIOS file in the DamonPS2 folder you created or selected.
Drag the button to change its position

"Your account will be cancelled.
If you log out of this account, the following user information retained by the Doomed platform account will be erased and cannot be retrieved."
Personal information and account property in the account: coins, traffic, content of the network disk, etc.

"After you apply for logout, the system will log out your account in 14 working days. After that, you will no longer be able to log in to the app with your account. During the waiting period, you can contact us via email to withdraw your cancellation request.
Please confirm your operation again!"
Encountered an error, please try again later
Are you sure you want to activate professional permissions in current account?

"The activation code can activate the professional permissions of the account. Official channels(YouTube/Reddit/Discord/Bilibili/QQ Group) will release activation codes irregularly, please pay attention!"
Please enter the correct Activation Code！
The activation code cannot be used across regions and countries. Please check the area where the activation code is valid.
Operation invalid! The account already has professional permission.
Add mine archived cloud consume coins
"Download other people's archives requires %d coins (free during the trial operation of the function), and download your own archives is free forever."
Purchase the professional version and download the archive for free forever!
Add to my cloud archive (%d coins)
Add to my cloud archive (Free for limited time)
"Agree with the above.Don't remind me again!"
You are using an illegally cloned version of %s. Please do not use malicious clone software to illegally clone %s app.
If you want to run %s games on your phone, please downloads the latest version of %s in Google Play Store or UpToDown app store.
A new update of %s has been available, please go to Google Play to get the update. New version of %s will has better game compatibility and running speed.
A new update of %s has been available, please update. New version of %s will has better game compatibility and running speed.

"1. Please download the %s from the Google Play store only. Do not download it from other third-party store. 2. Keep your Google Account logged in, and keep your network connection open for the first-time run."
The APP requires the network connection for license-authorization verification. Please check whether your network connection is work.
If you have already purchased the %s in the Google Play Store, please click \"Recheck\" to re-verify your pro-version permissions.
If you are a paid user who buys the Pro edition from Google Play, and if you have installed the following Harmful software, such as
etc., please uninstall these Illegal softwares.
After uninstalling the above software, Please, uninstalling existing %s on this phone, then re-download and re-install %s from Google Play.
If you have installed the following harmful software, such as:
, etc., please Uninstall above illegal software first. Then reinstall %s.
Harmful software that is used to cracking app is detected.
etc., please Uninstall above illegal software first, or use hidden list features of XposedMagisk framework to isolate %s from this harmful software. Then uninstall and reinstall %s.
Pro-version verify in process. Please try later.

"If you are a paid user who buys the Pro edition from Google Play, please re-download and re-install the %s from the Google Play store.
If you are NOT user who buys the Pro edition from Google Play, please ignore this information."

%s unable to connect to software license verification server on Google Play. In order to confirm whether you have purchased the professional version, please keep the internet network is connected, or close the app-cracker software on your phone. (Please note, cracker software maybe blocks the phone from connecting to the Google server.)
The updated version is downloading in the background
The updated version is downloading in the background
%s v%s. The updated version can be downloaded!
Download has started. You can check the download progress

"No ROM found for this game
How do I get game ROM?
1. If there is a game ROM in the mobile phone, you can get the ROM by Scan ROMs and BIOS
2. Or, you can add the game mirror ROM to the Damon PlayDrive, and then click to start up"
The archive is corrupted, do you want to delete it?
Detected that multiple gamepads are connected. Enable dual gamepad mode
Scan Canceled: found %1s BIOS files，%2s ROM files
Scan Finished: found %1s BIOS files，%2s ROM files
To play a game, you must have a BIOS image. You should use a homemade program to extract it from your host and get it. There are many tutorials on how to extract your host BIOS on the Internet.
Paid features will be permanently unlocked after purchase. In future APP upgrades, we will not charge any additional fees again

In order to allow the APP to call the camera to scan the QR code of the online game shared by friends to import game information, or take a photo to change the account avatar. If you refuse to authorize, you may not be able to use the aforementioned functions normally.
You can choose the following hot word as tags:
We does not include the cheat code for this game, you can provide it to us, please send an email to(With Cheat Code File Attached)：DamonPS2@outlook.com
Tip: You need to start the game at least once, and we can check whether there is a cheat codes after obtaining the necessary information
Cheat Code fetch failed! You can retry it latter!
It is currently the latest version!
Please first check Service Agreement and Privacy Statement
Please first check I have read and agree to the Service Agreement and Privacy Statement
Skip for now (Use App Private Data):
"-- Data will stay even if you uninstall %s -- Data can be shared between %s Pro/Free -- Easy USB-Storage access"
"-- Warning! Data will be lost when you uninstall %s! -- Data CAN NOT be shared between %s Pro/Free -- USB access through %s"
Choose where to save your Game data
You can select a new folder and access it after authorization
Choose or Create a New Directory
Push function has been turned off, we will no longer push customized messages to you!

"Local archives can now be synced to the cloud! Free backup, free download.
Players can upload their own archives to the server for cloud backup, and the cloud backup archives can be downloaded at any time, completely free of charge.
Each account can save up to 100 cloud archives, please remember your login account.
Cloud archives can be shared with friends. Similarly, you can download and use other people's archives, but it needs to consume %d coins. Of course, when someone else uses your save, you will be rewarded with %d coins.
All functions are free to use during the trial run
Let's earn coins together!
Share the archive to earn coins, download other people's archives for free (free during the trial operation of the function), download your own archives for free forever; buy the professional version and download the archives for free forever"

"Special instructions:
This feature is free for all accounts during trial operation (including downloading other people's archives)
This feature is permanently free for professional accounts (including downloading other people's archives) "

"You need to spend %d coins to get this archive.
Pro account can try any cloud save for free forever, let's buy a professional version
"
4 free coins (after watch free AD video)
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.

This app doesn’t have permission to do this. To change permissions, try logging into the app again.
Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.

Need to restart the emulator to take effect.
Need to restart the emulator to take effect. Setting the balance mode can balance the game frame rate and graphics display effect.
Need to restart the emulator to take effect. Selecting \"Compatibility\" will greatly reduce the frame rate. Please do not turn it on when it is not necessary.
Need to restart the emulator to take effect. Setting the frame rate priority can improve the game frame rate, but in some cases it may cause picture display errors.

"This mode will improve the game's rendering error or crash, in most PS2 games, but this mode will cause the most game's frame rate to drop. (For example, Final Fantasy 12 should not use this mode)"

"This mode will increase the most game's frame rate, but it may cause the game's rendering errors or crash. (For example, God of War 1, God of War 2 recommend using this mode, in order to get the fastest game frame rate)"
Your network connection has been switched to a cellular network. Do you want to continue downloading?
Always Download automatically, and Do not remind again
In the last time the app exited, there are unfinished files downloads in PlayDrive
Thank you for your donation to the %s!
"After donating, you will get a donation certificate, which can be shared to social software to prove your contribution to DamonPS2 Emulator Studio. "

For a better user experience, the products of DamonPS2 Emulator have given up most of the advertising revenue, but we still need more revenue to support the team to continue to develop and optimize the simulator, for Therefore, we hope to get your understanding and help.

"Donations are voluntary. At the same time, in order to reflect the speciality of the donation account, we will use medals to mark the back of your avatar. Depending on the donation amount, you can get up to three medals."

If you are like us, you also believe that one day there will be a PS2 emulator, Switch emulator, PS3 emulator and XBox emulator faster than PPSSPP on your phone. So, please support us with your actions, we need more encouragement from you.

With just a few simple settings, you can start playing the game.
Tip: Failed to access server, please make sure your network connection is OK.
File exception. The file is corrupt or has been deleted!
"No download required Read ROM directly from PlayDrive Please ensure that the network disk traffic exceeds 100MB"

If you use the Quick Start to run the game, the total network traffic consumed will not exceed the total capacity of the game ROM, no matter how many times you have started the game. Therefore, using this function can greatly save your Playdrive network traffic and mobile phone storage space.
Quick Start means you can start the game directly without waiting for all the data in the game ROM to download.
To start FlashPlay, the reserved download traffic of the PlayDrive needs to exceed
Extreme speed mode.(Recommended to tick under WIFI for better experience)

If you still want to connect your %1$s account, open the link on the same device where you started sign-in. Otherwise, tap Continue to sign-in on this device."

The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired, or has already been used.
"If the steps above didn't work, you can resend the email. Note that this will deactivate the link in the older email."

"Try these common fixes: • Check if the email was marked as spam or filtered. • Check your internet connection. • Check that you did not misspell your email. • Check that your inbox space is not running out or other inbox setting related issues. "

Sorry, the server will be back online after the maintenance will be finished. In this process, please wait patiently and try to launch the APP later. For more questions, please email:

This APP does not allow multiple gamers to use the software by sharing the same paid account, so we need to access the GPS location information, to confirm that the above illegal use has not occurred in the current smartphone. (This APP will do not save your personal privacy, location information is only used to Identify illegal gamers)

In order for us to send free game coins to your account, we need the following permissions so that we can read the hardware serial number of the current smartphone, to confirm your user ID. (note: We will never access your telephone directory during this process)
In order for the APP to properly read the game ROM from the flash memory of the smartphone, we need the following permissions.
The %s emulator requires the following permissions to work properly
Please fill in your phone number
"BIOS files are ready in my mobile phone. Click to Scan it Out!"
Permission to access device information (phone permission)

In order for us to smoothly send free game currency to your account, we need the following permissions so that we can read the hardware serial number of the current smartphone to confirm your user ID and receive free Game currency. (Note: We will not access your phone book, make calls or send and receive text messages during this process)

"BIOS files are detected in the PlayDrive. Click to Check!"
If you have more questions, join the Telegram group.

"Disclaimer: Just like Google Drive, the PlayDrive only provides empty cloud space and does not directly provide any pirated game ROM downloads. We do not recommend that game players do anything that infringes copyrights. If you use the sharing file function of the cloud space to spread piracy games, please bear the corresponding legal consequences yourself. If you have any legal issues and would like to give feedback to the PlayDrive development team, please email Damon_PlayDrive@outlook.com"

" Please make sure that you have the corresponding physical disk for all uploaded and imported content. Please do not share your personal online disk account with others to ensure your respect for intellectual property rights."
"You are using a mobile network to play videos. You may incur traffic charges"

Skips reverb effects processing, but may break some games (speedup)
Binds touchscreen swipe gesture to the simulated right joystick
Adjusts the ratio of touch movement to joystick
Only support Android-standard (also called HID-standard) gamepads. Other gamepads like XBOX, PS3/PS4 gamepads are not supported yet.
Allows you to press multiple virtual buttons at the same time by holding down and sliding your finger
The emulator automatically enables this fix based on the game.
The emulator enables this fix for all games.
After enabling, in addition to fixing screen errors, it also helps to further increase the frame rate.
When enabled, the picture quality is better, but the game frame rate maybe greatly reduced.

"If you turn this option on, you can make most ps2 games dramatically increase the frame rate. However, when this option is turned on, the translucent objects of a few games will have drawn incorrectly. Recommendation: It is highly recommended to turn this option on unless there are more fewer game screen errors after turning this option off."
Software emulation can improve the accuracy of emulation, but it may significantly reduce the frame rate. Not recommended for use.
"Turning on this option will allow the game's frame rate to be further improved, usually with no side effects. Recommendation: It is highly recommended that this option be turn-on."
If program detects the current GPU bottleneck, when the frame rate is lower than the threshold and lasts for a few seconds, the emulator automatically reduces the resolution.
If there are rectangular cracks, please try this option.
"Turning on this option will increase the game's frame rate, and let the wrong “shadow” effects disappear."

"(Recommended to enable this option) Enabling this option will result in more faster frame rates for some games, but may result in game texture draw errors (rarely occurring). Under the premise of not affecting game playability, it is recommended to enable this function and get the best frame rate."

If you increase the sync interval, you can get some games to get a faster frame rate, but it may cause the game display to draw incorrectly. Under the premise of not affecting the playability of the game, the larger the value of this parameter, the better.
"Turning on this option will increase the game's frame rate, only a handful of games that need to turn off this option to fix their texture map errors."
Selecting \"Compatibility\" will greatly reduce the frame rate. Please do not turn it on when it is not necessary.
Reduce the precision to improve the stitching errors of the texture map.

If the emulator crash immediately on booting, turn on this may fix the crash. (We have found some OpenGL ES 3.1 devices, are using out-of-date GPU graphic driver, which will crash on running OpenGL ES 3.1.)
It generally works for Namco games, e.g. Tekken Tag Tournament.
Tips: If the graphics has triangles error, please lower the clamp mode, but the side effect is that the frame rate will also drop.
"Delete the game's recent history, ROM file, and save states."
Tips: if the game freezes but the sound is OK, or the game crashes (e.g. address map error), please lower the EE speed
Disable by default (recommended). If enabled, the accuracy is higher, but the speed is very slow!
Tips: if the game freezes intermittently, please lower the overclock
Enable by default. If there is a problem with the game compatibility, please disable it.
Tips: most games work fine by default value
Tips: if the game freezes intermittently with no sound, please lower the system speed
Disable by default (recommended). If enabled, the compatibility of a few games can be improved, but the frame rate will be slower.
Tips: If the graphics has triangles error, please lower the VU speed
Enable by default (recommended). If enabled, all games can run faster, but the compatibility of a few games will decrease. If disabled, the frame rate will drop a lot!
Skip the BIOS loading when booting up
Please verify the professional version as soon as possible, so as not to affect the use!

PlayDrive is a network disk with unlimited capacity. Through this network disk, players can sync their game ROMs to their own private cloud space and save them permanently. For game ROM upload, it is completely free. However, to download these ROMs, you need to purchase traffic to download them. Currently only supports uploading and downloading %s game ROMs.
